Diary Type: The Daily Diary of President George Bush

Notes: President George Bush announces air strikes against Iraq, Beginning of the Gulf War
Diary Type: The Daily Diary of President George Bush

Notes: President George Bush Signs the Americans with Disabilites Act
President Franklin D. Roosevelt dies, Harry S. Truman sworn in as President.
Funeral services for President Franklin D. Roosevelt in East Room.
Admiral William D. Leahy presents President Truman with the Japanese surrender papers.
